messages.message: Hi i’m having quite bad performance issues on prod at the moment. File picker not loading directories, flows which took 20 seconds to run yesterday still running after 5 mins, and icons in the app drawer not loading.

Hi Lee! Are you experiencing this in a particular drive or across the system?
I just tried to browse the filesystem/read some files on prod and it was pretty fast for me :thinking_face:
The response from our webservers are very slow.
looks stable for job service and other components

I am having issues with running flows on instabase.com (http://instabase.com) at the moment as well. Maybe it’s related to fileservice issues on instabase.com (http://instabase.com).

ibflow link (https://instabase.com/saikat_biswas/HSBC/fs/Instabase%20Drive/files/COT_final/workflow/workflow_single_apply_udf.ibflow)

@Saikat this is related to the same issue, more details on this thread
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C01N7DV1137/p1622014962145600
